thread.title: Great spot in upper westside
thread.title_full: Great spot in upper westside - Review of NYLO New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Amy M
title: Great spot in upper westside
text:
Family of five
Double queen room had plenty of space with two queen beds and a pull out couchâ€¦ originally on lower floor but switched. Ask for a higher floor room with windows that look out onto Broadway! The lobby and bar scene was cozy but lively and fun and my three teenage boys loved the chessboard and the atmosphere. Easy access to subways and everything there is to do
will definitely stay here again!
